title: SIGSEGV - mrb_yield_with_class
vulnerability_information:
Linux Ubuntu Xenial X64
commit 63dbed00946afda34178a479cfa38fa78d620a00
Author: Yukihiro "Matz" Matsumoto <matz@ruby-lang.org>
Date:   Tue Mar 7 15:01:09 2017 +0900


PoC
```
def a
instance_exec (){return}
a()ensure
end
a
```

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!

activities.message: Reported as Design Issue! Wrong click! sorry!
activities.markdown_message: Reported as Design Issue! Wrong click! sorry!

activities.message: Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the crash and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3500
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the crash and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3500

activities.message:
Thanks again for your report.

As you noted, this issue was addressed upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/191ee2596cc7b22e3213d82bab1a48ae6152b475

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks again for your report.

As you noted, this issue was addressed upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/191ee2596cc7b22e3213d82bab1a48ae6152b475

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.

activities.message: Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify and the MRuby project!
